articles.title: All you need to know about ‘Apple BKC’, India's first Apple store in Mumbai - Hindustan Times
articles.description: On Wednesday, the tech giant shared a ‘teaser’ of the retail outlet, which is inside the Jio World Drive Mall at Bandra Kurla Complex.
articles.content: Apple on Wednesday shared a glimpse of its first-ever retail store for India, thus confirming long-standing reports of the tech giant being in talks to open its maiden outlet in the country. Called B… [+1242 chars]

articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: Menacing solar storm likely to strike Earth today as CME clouds approach - HT Tech
articles.description: NOAA forecasters have revealed that a dangerous solar storm is possible today, April 5, as a CME cloud is expected to deliver glancing blows to the Earth. Check what is about to happen.
articles.content: Yesterday, it was reported that a ring-shaped sunspot group grew 10-folds in just a period of 24 hours and was posing a threat of solar flare eruption for the Earth. But that is a problem for the fut… [+2259 chars]
